DOC.brief_summary: It is to be investigated if a correlation exist between the development of the HbA1c value and the complication rate is following a stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Neurological Complications at Stroke Patients With Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: The immediate objective of the study is to find out if a correlation between blood sugar control in diabetics and the incidence of complications after a stroke exists. The study has a high practical importance because any consequences in the treatment of diabetes mellitus can be implemented without affecting costs.
DOC.criteria: Stroke patients on the Stroke Unit with hyperglycemia with cerebral ischemia within the last 24 hours Patients with intracerebral hemorrhage Pregnant patients Patients with sensory aphasia
